ShiftLore: {"text": "When placed, all mobs will path directly towards the pumpkin and gather around it.","color": "gold","italic": true}
{"text": "This causes the pumpkin to take damage and eventually break, but it allows you to make interesting traps by forcing monsters towards a certain area.","color": "gold","italic": true}
{"text": "Pumpkins do not contribute towards your biodiversity score.","color": "gold","italic": true}
